Reverse Cipher¶

Reverse cipher implementation.

Provides functions to encrypt / decrypt a message by reversing it.

>>> encrypt('abcd')
'dcba'
>>> encrypt('dcba')
'abcd'
libcipher.reverse.encrypt(message)¶

Returns message encrypted using reverse cipher.

Due to the way reverse cipher works, the same function performs both encryption and decryption operation.

Parameters:message (str) – The message to be encrypted or decrypted
Returns:the encrypted / decrypted message
Return type:str
